attributes.action: Stop risking our lives and health. Reform the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
Letter to The Sunday Times November 20 2016 by over 60 consultants calling for a royal commission to cure the NHS

Leading article in the same issue by Sarah-Kate Templeton: We must think the unpalatable to stop death of NHS say doctors

Owen Paterson's report in October 2016 comparing the UK's NHS with other systems in the West. It found that 46000 people died unnecessarily each year because of failings in our health service
attributes.background: I am a retired medical doctor and have seen standards in health care deteriorate over several decades. My own experience and that of family and friends have reinforced that view. It is time to do something positive

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, we could accept a petition asking for a royal commission to be set up for the NHS.
